query.head: SELECT ?a ?aLabel WHERE {
query.body: OPTIONAL {{ {{ OPTIONAL {{ <{entity}> <{predicate}> ?a . }} }} UNION {{ OPTIONAL {{ <{entity}> <{predicate}> ?a . ?a rdfs:label ?aLabel . FILTER(LANG(?aLabel) = "en") . }} }} }}

query.head: SELECT ?a ?aLabel WHERE {
query.body: OPTIONAL {{ {{ OPTIONAL {{ ?a <{predicate}> <{entity}> . }} }} UNION {{ OPTIONAL {{ <{entity}> <{predicate}> ?a . ?a rdfs:label ?aLabel . FILTER(LANG(?aLabel) = "en") . }} }} }}
